verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor [A] Psalm לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid; of David בְּ֝בָרְח֗וֹ <WH1272> be-va-re-Cho, when he fled מִפְּנֵ֤י׀ <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from אַבְשָׁל֬וֹם <WH53> av-sha-Lom Absalom בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> be-No. his son יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD מָֽה־ <WH4100> mah- how רַבּ֣וּ <WH7231> rab-Bu how are they increased צָרָ֑י <WH6862> tza-Rai; that trouble רַ֝בִּ֗ים <WH7227> rab-Bim, me many קָמִ֥ים <WH6965> ka-Mim [are] they that rise up עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lai. against

רַבִּים֮ <WH7227> rab-Bim Many אֹמְרִ֪ים <WH559> 'o-me-Rim [there be] which say לְנַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> le-Naf-Shi of my soul אֵ֤ין <WH369> 'ein There יְֽשׁוּעָ֓תָה <WH3444> ye-shu-'A-tah [There is] no help לּ֬וֹ lo בֵֽאלֹהִ֬ים <WH430> ve-lo-Him for him in God סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah O יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh But thou O LORD מָגֵ֣ן <WH4043> ma-Gen [art] a shield בַּעֲדִ֑י <WH1157> ba-'a-Di; about כְּ֝בוֹדִ֗י <WH3519> ke-vo-Di, for me my glory וּמֵרִ֥ים <WH7311> u-me-Rim and the lifter up רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <WH7218> ro-Shi. of mine head

ק֭וֹלִי <WH6963> Ko-li with my voice אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> 'ek-Ra; I cried וַיַּֽעֲנֵ֨נִי <WH6030> vai-ya-'a-Ne-ni and he heard מֵהַ֖ר <WH2022> me-Har hill קָדְשׁ֣וֹ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho me out of his holy סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I שָׁכַ֗בְתִּי <WH7901> sha-Chav-ti, I laid me down וָֽאִ֫ישָׁ֥נָה <WH3462> va-'I-Sha-nah and slept הֱקִיצ֑וֹתִי <WH6974> he-ki-Tzo-ti; I awaked כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD יִסְמְכֵֽנִי׃ <WH5564> yis-me-Che-ni. sustained

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not אִ֭ירָא <WH3372> 'I-ra I will not be afraid מֵרִבְב֥וֹת <WH7233> me-riv-Vot of ten thousands עָ֑ם <WH5971> 'Am; of people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Who סָ֝בִ֗יב <WH5439> sa-Viv, [themselves] against me round about שָׁ֣תוּ <WH7896> Sha-tu that have set עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lai. against

ק֘וּמָ֤ה <WH6965> ku-Mah Arise יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD הוֹשִׁ֘יעֵ֤נִי <WH3467> ho-Shi-'E-ni save אֱלֹהַ֗י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai, me O my God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הִכִּ֣יתָ <WH5221> hik-Ki-ta for thou hast smitten אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> 'o-ye-Vai all mine enemies לֶ֑חִי <WH3895> Le-chi; [upon] the cheek bone שִׁנֵּ֖י <WH8127> shin-Nei the teeth רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im of the ungodly שִׁבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <WH7665> shib-Bar-ta. thou hast broken

לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [belongeth] unto the LORD הַיְשׁוּעָ֑ה <WH3444> hay-shu-'Ah; Salvation עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon עַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha [is] upon thy people בִרְכָתֶ֣ךָ <WH1293> vir-cha-Te-cha thy blessing סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah
